Generated Narrative: ValueSet r2bo-topografica-cieo-VS

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where constraint = ^446608001,<91723000
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server)
    CodeDisplay
    87100004Topography unknown
    21229009Topography not assigned
  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/icd-o-3 version Not Stated (use latest from terminology server) where concept descends from T (Topografía)

name: TopograficaSnomedCIEOVS
title: Set de Valores para Topografía
description: Set de valores utilizados para la topografía, estos pueden ser mapeados de Snomed CT a la CIE-O 3 Tográfico o ser usado directamente en CIE-O 3 Tográfico
